junction.name: account_parties
junction.brief: Links an IAM account to a party.
junction.description:
Junction table linking IAM accounts to parties. Each account can be
associated with one or more parties, controlling which parties a user
can act on behalf of.

left.index_comment: Index for looking up parties for an account

right.index_comment: Index for finding accounts associated with a party
right.description: ID of the party this account is associated with.
